name: full-stack-blend
description: Full-Stack Development Platform For Web Application
author: SoftenStorm.com

scripts.build: npm run copy-static-assets && npm run lint && npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run build-bundle
scripts.watch: kill-port 443 && kill-port 8000 && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-bundle" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.build-bundle: browserify dist/public/js/construction/editor/Editor.js -o dist/public/js/construction/Editor.bundle.js && browserify dist/public/js/construction/editor/Worker.js -o dist/public/js/construction/Worker.bundle.js && browserify dist/public/js/construction/area/Html.js -o dist/public/js/construction/Html.bundle.js && browserify dist/public/js/Embed.js -o dist/public/js/Embed.bundle.js && browserify dist/public/js/Site.js -o dist/public/js/Site.bundle.js
scripts.watch-bundle: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "watchify dist/public/js/construction/editor/Editor.js -o dist/public/js/construction/Editor.bundle.js" "watchify dist/public/js/construction/editor/Worker.js -o dist/public/js/construction/Worker.bundle.js" "watchify dist/public/js/construction/area/Html.js -o dist/public/js/construction/Html.bundle.js" "watchify dist/public/js/Embed.js -o dist/public/js/Embed.bundle.js" "watchify dist/public/js/Site.js -o dist/public/js/Site.bundle.js"
scripts.build-sass: node-sass src/public/css/main.scss dist/public/css/main.css && node-sass src/public/css/construction/distribution/embed.scss -o dist/public/css/ && node-sass src/public/css/construction/area/area.scss -o dist/public/css/construction/ && node-sass src/public/css/construction/area/settings.scss -o dist/public/css/construction/ && node-sass src/public/css/construction/editor/editor.scss -o dist/public/css/construction/
scripts.watch-sass: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "node-sass -w src/public/css/main.scss -o dist/public/css/main.css" "node-sass -w src/public/css/construction/distribution/embed.scss -o dist/public/css/" "node-sass -w src/public/css/construction/area/area.scss -o dist/public/css/construction/" "node-sass -w src/public/css/construction/area/settings.scss -o dist/public/css/construction/" "node-sass -w src/public/css/construction/editor/editor.scss -o dist/public/css/construction/"
scripts.reset: git restore -s@ -SW -- src/controllers/components ; git restore -s@ -SW -- src/public/js/components ; git restore -s@ -SW -- src/controllers/Home.ts ; git restore -s@ -SW -- src/public/js/Site.tsx ; git restore -s@ -SW -- views/home ; git clean -f -d
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-sass-area" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
